name: RM - Basic - Photography
prompt: photorealistic photography of {prompt} . hyper-realistic visual fidelity, incredibly sharp focus, lifelike texture, 8k resolution, natural lighting, optical clarity, depth of field, raw reality, captured on high-end dslr
negative_prompt: painting, drawing, sketch, cartoon, anime, 3d render, illustration, low resolution, blur

name: RM - Basic - Portrait Photography
prompt: studio portrait photography of {prompt} . professional lighting setup, 85mm lens aesthetic, razor-sharp focal point, creamy bokeh background, high-end retouching style, emotive connection, skin texture detail, intimate composition
negative_prompt: wide angle, landscape, distorted, messy, low quality, grainy, blurry, out of focus

name: RM - Basic - Painting
prompt: classic oil painting of {prompt} . rich traditional media textures, visible brushstrokes, layered pigment depth, artistic composition, painterly aesthetic, masterful technique, canvas texture
negative_prompt: photo, digital, vector, flat, glossy, 3d, realistic, camera

name: RM - Basic - Portrait Painting
prompt: fine art portrait painting of {prompt} . expressive brushwork, psychological depth, traditional canvas texture, classical lighting, artistic interpretation, emotional resonance, impasto details
negative_prompt: photograph, snapshot, digital art, flat, vector, cartoon, anime

name: RM - Basic - Cinematic Film Still
prompt: cinematic film still of {prompt} . wide aspect ratio, anamorphic lens flare, color graded, dramatic lighting, motion picture aesthetic, high budget production value, storytelling composition, atmospheric depth
negative_prompt: vertical, amateur, home video, tv show, sitcom, bright, flat, studio

name: RM - Basic - Sketch
prompt: rough pencil sketch of {prompt} . graphite texture, loose gestural lines, hand-drawn shading, unfinished paper aesthetic, artistic study, raw stroke details, monochromatic sketch
negative_prompt: color, paint, digital, realistic, photo, 3d, clean, polished

name: RM - Basic - Illustration
prompt: digital illustration of {prompt} . clean artistic lines, vibrant color application, stylized composition, polished commercial aesthetic, creative visual storytelling, refined graphic design, smooth finish
negative_prompt: photo, realistic, sketchy, messy, rough, grainy, traditional paint

name: RM - Basic - Digital Illustration
prompt: high-quality digital illustration of {prompt} . expressive digital painting techniques, smooth gradients, crisp resolution, vibrant RGB color palette, tablet artistry, contemporary aesthetic, clean execution, professional portfolio quality
negative_prompt: traditional media, paper texture, rough, sketch, watercolor, oil painting, grainy, blurry, low res, pixelated

name: RM - Basic - Line Art
prompt: minimalist line art of {prompt} . continuous contour lines, black ink on white, clean negative space, elegant simplicity, vector-style precision, graphic abstraction, outlining
negative_prompt: color, shading, gradient, realistic, photo, painting, complex, busy

name: RM - Basic - Minimal Ink & Tone
prompt: ink-and-tone illustration of {prompt} . stylized realism, crisp linework, refined print-era finish, intimate and restrained, cool neutral tones, stark and empty background, minimal, graphic, modern pop-graphic aesthetic, subtle halftone texture
negative_prompt: vibrant, colorful, warm tones, 3d render, photorealistic, messy, chaotic, busy, oil painting, watercolor, happy, energetic

name: RM - Basic - Manga
prompt: classic manga style art of {prompt} . black and white ink, screentone shading, dynamic paneling feel, traditional Japanese comic aesthetic, expressive linear energy, detailed inking
negative_prompt: color, 3d, painting, realistic, western comic, soft, watercolor

name: RM - Basic - Anime
prompt: high-quality anime art of {prompt} . vibrant cel shading, clean distinct lines, emotional lighting, high-fidelity animation style, colorful and expressive, polished digital finish
negative_prompt: sketch, realistic, 3d, western cartoon, gritty, dirty, low res

name: RM - Basic - 3D Render
prompt: 3D octane render of {prompt} . ray-traced global illumination, photorealistic materials, subsurface scattering, ambient occlusion, physically based rendering, unreal engine 5 aesthetic, virtual perfection
negative_prompt: 2d, drawing, painting, sketch, flat, cartoon, anime, brushstrokes

name: RM - Basic - Concept Art
prompt: digital concept art of {prompt} . broad brushstrokes, atmospheric lighting, visual development style, imaginative composition, rough but evocative, cinematic pre-production aesthetic
negative_prompt: photo, finished render, clean lines, vector, realistic, polish

name: RM - Basic - Pixel Art
prompt: retro pixel art of {prompt} . low resolution 16-bit aesthetic, limited color palette, blocky geometry, nostalgic gaming vibe, dithering shading, sprite style, crisp pixels
negative_prompt: high resolution, anti-aliasing, smooth, vector, 3d, realistic, photo

name: RM - Basic - Claymation
prompt: stop-motion claymation style of {prompt} . plasticine texture, thumbprints, physical lighting, miniature photography aesthetic, hand-crafted feel, Aardman animation style
negative_prompt: digital, cgi, 2d, drawing, painting, smooth, vector, anime

name: RM - Basic - Watercolor
prompt: soft watercolor painting of {prompt} . translucent fluid pigments, wet-on-wet technique, artistic color bleeding, textured paper grain, delicate atmospheric washes, expressive splatter, ethereal artistic style
negative_prompt: oil paint, heavy acrylic, digital, sharp lines, opaque, vector, flat

name: RM - Basic - Vector Art
prompt: clean vector graphic art of {prompt} . smooth crisp bezier curves, flat bold colors, geometric precision, scalable aesthetic, minimalist design, sharp edges, professional graphic illustration
negative_prompt: pixelated, blurry, sketchy, textured, realistic, photo, watercolor, shading

name: RM - Basic - Sculpture
prompt: classical sculpture of {prompt} . chiseled marble or bronze texture, three-dimensional form, dramatic gallery lighting, static solidity, realistic anatomical definition, museum masterpiece aesthetic
negative_prompt: 2d, flat, painting, drawing, colorful, flesh, living, moving

name: RM - Basic - Charcoal
prompt: expressive charcoal drawing of {prompt} . deep black carbon tones, smudged textural shading, rough paper grain, high contrast chiaroscuro, dramatic monochromatic atmosphere, raw artistic energy
negative_prompt: color, paint, digital, smooth, clean, vector, shiny

name: RM - Basic - Papercraft
prompt: layered papercraft art of {prompt} . cut paper textures, dimensional stacked layers, cast shadows between sheets, craft aesthetic, physical depth, tactile collage feel, minimalist geometry
negative_prompt: drawing, painting, flat, 3d render, realistic, glossy, digital

name: RM - Basic - Graffiti
prompt: urban graffiti art of {prompt} . vibrant spray paint textures, aerosol drips, bold street art aesthetic, mural composition, expressive tag style, rough wall surface texture, rebellious energy
negative_prompt: clean, studio, canvas, paper, elegant, framed, traditional

name: RM - Basic - Low Poly
prompt: low poly 3D art of {prompt} . simplified polygonal geometry, faceted angular surfaces, retro video game aesthetic, flat shading, vibrant minimalism, abstract geometric form
